rules.ruleString: For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1003, ATS1023, ATS2003, ATS2023} Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2003}

description: Chinese Intermediate 2 completes an overview of the important sentence structures of modern standard Chinese.  Equal emphasis is placed on the four skills of reading, writing, listening and speaking.  Speaking classes cover practical, everyday situations to develop interactive competence at a basic level in a range of situations likely to be encountered in daily life in contemporary China.  In addition to regular classroom activities, listening and reading skills will be further developed through the use of audio/visual, Web-based and computer assisted learning materials.
